oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Different customs concerning the eating of the Porcupine. By /han≠kass’o (L VII.
6594 rev.). The people who live where the sun sets (the place where Dia!kwain and his people come from) roast and eat the porcupine on the hunting
ground, but |han≠kass'o's people take the porcupine home when there are no springbok.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mode of eating porcupine
